content.rendered:
Usman is a passionate and energetic working professional with over 11 years of work experience in several fields. He has majored in Finance and Business Administration and  holds an MBA with specialism in Finance. He started his career in higher education at the age of 24 and since then has taught a variety of different subjects. Usman joined Regent College London in February 2020.

Usman strengths lie in Quantitative Analysis, Credit Risk Management, Financial Analysis, and Derivatives with growing expertise in Financial Investment and SME.

Courses taught  

Financial Decision Making, Marketing, Accounting, Derivatives, Corporate Finance, Human Resource Management, Organisational Behaviour and Business Law.
